website_summaries.verdict: All natural wipes you and your pet will both feel good about.
pros: All natural bamboo wipes are environmentally friendly
Wipes are large, moist, and durable with no scent
Wipes effectively remove dirt and pet dander while remaining gentle on your pet's skin
Works well on long haired cats and dogs
cons: Packaging is difficult to work with
Consider storing wipes in a resealable container instead

website_summaries.verdict: Reasonably priced pet wipes that are hypoallergenic, making them safer for pets and owners.
pros: Includes natural ingredients for a healthy shine on the coat
Wipes will break down quickly after use, featuring a bamboo base material
Lower price per wipe than average
cons: Some wipes have an off-putting odor as you're using them
Packaging makes it difficult to grab 1 wipe

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These wipes work perfectly!I have an English bulldog who loves these wipes. Every time I pull out the package he gets all excited. I use these wipes to regularly wipe his face, eyes, and all his crevices between his wrinkles. I highly recommend these for any pet owner!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cecena

customer_reviews.title: Pogi's Pet Wipes Makes Puddycat Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I have an 18 year old greasy cat. She is too old to groom herself well. So I clean her using these wipes every other day. I just stroke her fur with it like I am petting her. One wipe does the trick. She tolerates them pretty well until after about the 50th pass over her coat! Her coat gets pretty clean from the wipes and she smells nice. Amazingly they stay very moist even after a few months. I would order these again in a heartbeat and hopefully she will live long enough for me to do so! ps She does not have renal failure.
customer_reviews.author: Notbyworx

customer_reviews.title: Best wipes for poop and more!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing to use for puppies, from in between baths and poop! My pup loves these wipes! Hope you guys come out with other products! Love your stuff! (Well, my puppy does too!)
customer_reviews.author: work-a-holic-agent

customer_reviews.title: Contains really bad chemicals
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients shown on the seller's page for this product exclude all of the really bad chemicals that are the real ingredients listed on the actual item's packaging. I wouldn't have gotten these for my pet if I'd known the actual ingredients are several cancer causing chemicals. Advertising this product as natural with false ingredients is extremely misleading.
customer_reviews.author: rdrnnracquisitions

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works well.
customer_reviews.text: Love these, I have a very long haired cat (Maine Coon) and while he grooms regularly, his hair gets a bit dull and greasy. A few quick wipes with these (which he tolerates fairly well) and his fur is clean shiny and SUPER soft! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: These are awful. I can't imagine anyone giving these a good review, even given the good value. The smell is terrible and makes my dog stink worse than she did. I intended to use these for between bath times when my lab mix, Coco, needs a little wipe-down, but mostly I just use them to wipe her paws off because of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Non-irritating pet wipes
customer_reviews.text: I have an older cat with constipation issues (TMI, sorry) and he sometimes needs a little help with cleaning. I've had these for 4 months because I don't need to use them too often and wanted to make sure that I liked the quality. They don't seem to cause him any skin irritation, although he does not appreciate being wiped down. He probably won't have minded it if it wasn't a new insult at the age of 17! The scent isn't very noticeable. I will continue to purchase these for his bathroom and paw wiping needs.
customer_reviews.author: the cat's meow

customer_reviews.title: Great scent and strength!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. They don’t smell like a bathroom like others tend to - I got the green tea scent. They say extra large but they are a normal wipe size, the packaging is quite wide though. They have enough traction and strength to clean eyes and wipe all 4 paws. And they don’t dry out. The closure is good but doesn’t make it too difficult to take out of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Works on Giant Dogs! Great thickness and size!
customer_reviews.text: I have big hairy dogs and I use these wipes for a face wash, cleaning muzzles and ears, also for feet and peed-on pants, and for wet chests. I love the size and thickness of these wipes. They don’t fray nor tear, and they’re really nice to hold when you’re cleaning dogs’ surfaces. The packaging made it hard to grab one wipe at a time unless you’re really careful and take your time. Most of the time 2 comes out but since I have 2 dogs, it’s a non-issue.
customer_reviews.author: Velvy

customer_reviews.title: Deccided to try this product after reading reviews and considering the things others didn't like about similar products
customer_reviews.text: I never knew there were any products of this type until I decided to do a search on how to clean a cat. We had no rain for quite a long stretch & out indoor/outdoor cat had a lot of dust on his fur & paws. Deccided to try this product after reading reviews and considering the things others didn't like about similar products. We have been very pleased with this. Easy to use. Cat doesn't mind it. We keep them by the back door & now entering the rainy season great t owipe the pasw before track up the wood laminate floors.
customer_reviews.author: B. Larrain

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it...
customer_reviews.text: HI Amazonians, I got this product with high hopes, but my issues is this.. when I come back from my walk with my dog, I tend to wipes his paws upon coming home so I keep this by the door. First of all, I can't pull only ONE tissue, it comes out either none or 4 at a time so it gets wasted. Also, the opening it not good, I have to push it to closed it shut so no more dry tissue. I am not going to buy this product anymore... looking for something that it is easy to use, pull one tissue at time and I don't have to struggle.
customer_reviews.author: GO4IT

customer_reviews.title: It’s unscented but not pleasant...
customer_reviews.text: There a lot of wipes but honestly the smell of the unscented wipes drove me crazy... it’s so hard to desribe scent- its not a perfumey smell but it’s not pleasant. I tried this for about a month, wiping my cats paws and body down with this and she always smelled like feet after so I decided that I had to retire this product... I can’t
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Priced right, quality fantastic, work very well!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my two dogs. Both are pit-mixes and weigh between 50-65 lbs. they love being wiped down with them, and these especially work great for cleaning their bum, and feet, getting between the toes and making sure to keep a dogs feet in good shape can turn into a real nightmare if you allow it to. These help with making sure that does not ever happen. These will be ordered again when we get low. Price point is good, quality is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: S. Bassler

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes but you need a box or wipes pouch
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. We use them on our geriatric cat who often doesn't poop very clean or steps in it accidentally and makes a mess on his paws. These wipes have been a lifesaver. They're really tough and thick so we can really scrub his paws clean. We have one box on each floor of the house. Like people have noted though, the packaging is very bad. It's impossible to get open quickly and pull one out easily. I ended up taking out the wipes and putting them in a refillable diaper wipe box which you can get at Target for like $3. If you need to carry them around, maybe try something like this:
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Wu

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a horrible smell!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my cat tends to make a mess getting wet food all over her face when she eats. She cleans herself but I can usually still smell her food on her, so I wanted to find an easy way to wipe at least her face clean. Well, these leave behind an even more horrible smell and I would have to wipe her again with a wet cloth!! I felt bad for her having to smell herself!
customer_reviews.author: Connor Waitt

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: just like regular wet napkin. It doesn't help with pet smell.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great Wipes -- Infuriating Packaging
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are great to freshen up our puppy and wipe his bum after going. We've ordered several packages and probably will continue to do so. The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is that the packaging can be infuriating at times! It is quite difficult to just get one wipe out of the small opening. Holding the puppy in one hand and trying to get just one out is sometimes impossible, as it can drag out 3 or 4 additional wipes that are very difficult to stuff back in the packaging. I tried ordering a competitor product that has a pop-up opening, but it didn't work any better in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: B. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Product damaged on two different orders.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried to order these wipes twice now and each time they are delivered the envelope is opened and the product is missing... not sure if the carrier is to blame here but this happened on only my two orders with this product. I was hoping to be able to try them at least.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Williams

customer_reviews.title: He had some ringworm when we got him from the shelter (and smelled like an old litter box and moth balls
customer_reviews.text: I used these on my cat. He had some ringworm when we got him from the shelter (and smelled like an old litter box and moth balls, sadly). Used these to try and take that smell out of his fur and keep the ringworm from spreading as he took medication. We definitely needed a few passes, but these did work. The wipes only had a very faint soapy smell, which did not seem to bother the cat at all. The wipe bag/case keeps the wipes moist, but the pack would fit in a large ziplock if you wanted an extra barrier.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Don't cut the container open!
customer_reviews.text: First, these are great wipes. Handy and effective. Purpose here is to warn you not to do what I did the first time I bought these - I didn't notice the flap on the TOP of the package, and thinking it had to be cut open, I did just that. Then had to put the entire contents into another container because I'd messed up by not using the resealable flap.
customer_reviews.author: George J. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: My female dog smells better too and their breaths are not as bad as ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time getting 1 out of the container. My male dog slips with anal gland leaks occasionally and when he does, I grab these and start wiping. The smell goes away very quickly and I don't have to get out of the area for long. I used to have to wash everything around the area and still had the smell linger . His glands don't fill up, they just leak at the wrong time. My female dog smells better too and their breaths are not as bad as they used to be from licking. Would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: Best wipes, but dispenser could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Best dog wipes I’ve found on the market. Nice and thick, with enough moisture but not too much that they’re dripping. Right now the packaging isn’t great and it’s a pain to fish the wipes out of the little hole. I’ll update and add the 5th star when they change the packaging to be a pop-up dispenser. This will involve them interleaving the wipes rather than stacking them. I’ve contacted the seller and they’ve informed me that they’ll take my feedback into consideration. If you agree with my comments about the packaging please reach out to them as well! That all being said, I’m going to continue buying these, packaging be damned. They really are the best ones.
customer_reviews.author: V.N.

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients not accurate in listing, dog had reaction to them
customer_reviews.text: Giving these 2 stars only because they are a good size and have a good texture for grabbing dirt... but I stopped using them because my dog seemed to lick her paws and they got red so I assume she’s allergic to something in them. I gave them to a friend and her dog started licking her paws too. These are made in China (they don’t tel you that in the description) and more importantly, the ingredients listing in the product description isn’t correct! There are other “less desirable” sounding ingredients they conveniently omitted, which I don’t appreciate and won’t be buying this brand again. It’s surprisingly hard to find wipes made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Ann

customer_reviews.title: Large and thick
customer_reviews.text: Just got these in. They are super effective and large there's 100 of them it's a huge packet. And they smelled good..love them!
customer_reviews.author: SonjaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Simply great
customer_reviews.text: Five stars for everything! We bought this more than a year ago, and only use it occasionally for our cat (who was a kitten then). Like what people are saying, these wipes stay wet for a long time; even a year after! We've finally run out, and I'm buying more. I thought about going scented, but even the unscented ones smell pretty decent/clean. The cat doesn't seem to mind when we use it on him (which is always a good plus for cat owners).
customer_reviews.author: T. G.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well, doesn't leave a residue, doesn't dry out
customer_reviews.text: These are our favorite dog wipes. They don't dry out even after leaving the package open for months kept in a hot garage during the summer. We bought a 4 pack exactly one year ago and are down to the last few wipes. The sticky tab sometimes does lose some stickiness after a few months but we just store the package upside down to help keep it closed and never have any problems with the wipes getting dry. They are also durable and a decent size (larger than the average human baby wipe). They do also actually clean well and don't leave any residue when cleaning my pup, we use on his paws and his body.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: They're Alright
customer_reviews.text: I use them on my white Persian kitten every few days. They don't keep her white, but they do make her soft and fluffy. I have to use two at the same time because they are not that big and she hates them, so it's easier to rub her down and cover more area with one in each hand. I bought the unscented packs due to the other reviews complaining about the scented ones. They don't seem to have a smell or leave a smell after use, so that's a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: ASMR ShySteph

customer_reviews.title: Doggie wipes
customer_reviews.text: My main issue with these is the difficulty in getting just one out of the package at a time. Everytime I use them, several wipes want to bunch up. And when I separate one out, then I have a problem getting the others to lay flat enough to reseal the package. Added to that problem, is that most of the time I need these, I am also trying to deal with a dog that needs wiped. I think they need to put these in a plastic, resealable container. That would make using them so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Debby S. Bogle

customer_reviews.title: It was OK
customer_reviews.text: My Havanese puppy pees on himself sometimes when he lifts his leg. I bought these wipes to help keep him clean, but I was using 4 or 5 wipes at a time to wipe him off and he's pretty small. If you need these wipes for just a general wipe down these would work, but they weren't that great for actually getting off dirt/stains/debris effectively with one wipe. I needed several. I also didn't like the smell of them.
customer_reviews.author: msdc25

customer_reviews.title: Well moistened and large
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are moist and seem to easily wipe the paws and coat of my Havanese. They leave her coat smooth and as one can see after using the wipe, remove all newly acquired surface dirt. My dog seems to enjoy being wiped down with them. Each wipe is thick enough and I've never had one tear apart while using. I would like them a bit more of there was a plastic top to open and close similar to what is on many baby wipes. However, I'm sure this would add to the cost and might not be worth it because in addition to being good wipes, these are reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Lou250

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaning Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Wipes work well for cleaning up smelly dog parts, but they have some real problems: 1) They are really, really hard to get out of the package when you're trying to quickly wipe up something (as in dog in one hand, groping for towellette in the other). 3-5 come out at once and then what? You try to stuff 'em back in? 2) The closure doesn't seal well so they dry out. 3) They are really larger and thicker than I wanted. So. They're good at cleaning & deodorizing, but the delivery system could use work.
customer_reviews.author: hover

customer_reviews.title: They work well as wipes for dogs
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy regular unscented baby wipes for my indoor toy poodle, but a scarcity caught me off guard. Was glad to find these wipes made for pets. Unfortunately, they are scented and contain an ingredient I don't like, but as a sustitute when I could not get the ideal, they work fine. I would also prefer the packaging of regular baby wipes, which does not rely on a piece of tape to keep the package closed and the wipes from drying out. Whether or not I will buy them again depends on availability of my preferred brand, but I am thankful to have these on hand now.
customer_reviews.author: British Mystery Buff

customer_reviews.title: needs better packaging
customer_reviews.text: The wipes themselves are great and one goes a long way but the packaging is awful. My wife and I both purchased this brand when we needed more wipes, so we had a few packs to go through and every one of them eventually ripped. Once the bag would have a slight tear in the slot to pull out the wipes it would gradually get bigger until the tear was big enough that we couldn't seal it. We had to eventually put the wipes in a zipped baggy to keep them from drying out. I wouldn't purchase these again until they fix the packaging so that it seals without tearing.
customer_reviews.author: Miraclemike3

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Loving these wipes!! For starters, the package is a lot bigger than I expected so you really get a lot for your money. Secondly, they work really well! I have a chihuahua mix, and if anyone here is familiar with small dog breeds, they get a lot of eye goopies lol. My dog gets crusty undereyes and these wipes break that stuff down easily. I've also used these to clean his paws and ears. Granted, his paws and ears really weren't dirty when I tried it but still lol. They're just super convenient and large enough to use on larger parts of the dog. Highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Boucher

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I have a 15 lb Havanese and this cloth is the perfect size for cleaning paws etc after a walk. They are soft, well moistened, unscented and my dog knows the routine and comes right over for the wipes. In the very hot weather I think they particularly felt cooling and great. As far as packaging is concerned, it is sometimes difficult to get one out at a time. When you are holding a dog with one hand, you want to get one at a time with the other and not have to separate and stuff extras back in package.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie S

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Alternative to Baths for Cats!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty is indoor/outdoor now and with the pollen count being at an all-time high and with who knows what dirt and trash he gets into outside- these wipes make it so easy to get him cleaned up without making him get in water. I don't give him an official bath much, because he REALLY HATES baths. So it's nice to get him cleaned up without that hassle. He doesn't mind the wipes at all. So glad for htis earth-friendly, product!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: It takes a minute to get one wipe out
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I need out of the box of wipes is to be able to get one wipe out in a second With the next one sticking out just a bit. Simple, right? With these wipes it might take me a minute. Sometimes it’s hard to find the end of a wipe, other times one wipe drags 3 or 4 with it out of the box. How hard can it be? Cotonnelle seemed to be able to solve this issue. Would not recommend buying because it will frustrate you every time you try using them.
customer_reviews.author: ID

customer_reviews.title: My Girls Love Pogi's!
customer_reviews.text: I'm the mother of two cats that have never had a bath in their 2 years because they act up horribly whenever they are near water. Taking them to the vet for a bath also didn't work because they refused to get out of their carriers. I decided I had nothing to lose by trying the wipes as an alternative to a bath. I fully expected to have to tussle with them to let me use the wipes on them so imagine my surprise when they sat down serenely and let me wipe them down! They loved the Pogi's and I will continue to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: iGGi approves it!
customer_reviews.text: It's the best wipes for your fur-baby! Cleans away those messy and stinky dirt after your pet's outdoor adventure. Since these wipes are hypoallergenic, I used it to clear those gounds from my pet's eyes and wipe the stinky butt (after potty). It has a larger size, so it cleans a wider area of your pet's fur. What is most important, @iggi_saintbernard approves it!
customer_reviews.author: Sole Wanderers

customer_reviews.title: Smells AWFUL & impossible to pull out of package!!
customer_reviews.text: I totally agree with all the negative reviews about the terrible "tea" smell of these wipes. I expected something light and fresh, but these smell like dirty socks. Totally gross. It makes me wonder if the cleaning solution inside the package had gone bad. DON'T USE THESE ON YOUR DOG. The disgusting way they smell, you could actually be rubbing germs and bacteria on their body--- NOT CLEANING at all. Also, the packaging for travel might seem convenient, but the entire clump of wipes comes out when you try to pull out just one. It's a mess. We threw all of these away. Stick with baby wipes.
customer_reviews.author: LadyDestinyRoseTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Nice dog wipes
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to freshen our dog up in between baths. They smell very nice and she tolerates them well. They are individually packaged 20 wipes to a package so they stay fresh. A little on the pricey side but if you don't want your dog smelling like baby wipes then worth it. :)
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good-sized wipes that aren't dry
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 240 count pack because that is the best deal and you get 12 individually packaged with 20 wipes each. This is actually my second order, and I fancy these more than the other competitors. With other wipes, I have to use 5 to 6 wipes to wipe my puppy, but with the Pogi wipes, I only have to use 2. My first order actually did last months (January and February 2019), and my puppy and I are pretty satisfied with them. Will be back here in 2 months for another order!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lebroski

customer_reviews.title: I must be the only one who doesn't love the smell.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the smell was weird. Not perfume-y, not strong, but just off... like not making my sweet, old girl smell a whole lot better. They do feel very clean and seem to clean her fur well. The wipes are thick and seem to be good quality, so I will keep using them. Not sure if I would buy them again. Also, I agree with others who said the packaging stinks. I always seem to be pulling more than one wipe out and then when I put it back in, there's a huge lump on the top and it doesn't seal as well. Good price, though.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: They work well; large and easy to hold in one hand while holding the dog with the other.
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are great. Large, easy to handle and they do the job of cleaning up the pee my male Papillon gets on his belly hair when he goes to visit the fire hydrant. They do tend to stick together so separating one takes a bit of dexterity, but that's usually the case with wipes in general. I purchased a plastic container with a lid that seals, big enough to hold the wipes without the bag and that works much better. I use them multiple times a day and they don't damage dog hair. I use the unscented and they truly are unscented, just how I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Scherer

customer_reviews.title: Except for the odor, functional wipes.
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have about these wipes, is the odor. The wipes are large and durable enough to freshen up a medium size dog. However, they smell like most cheap, pungent, baby/wet wipes. There was another brand that had wipes with natural ingredients that held up well, with only a pleasantly mild hint of a selected natural scent of your choosing, like coconut or lemongrass. But our dog doesn't mind them, and still tries to lick them as we use them sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: AnthonyD

customer_reviews.title: These are large sized wipes with a very light clean scent.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these wipes for quite sometime now. I have a miniature schnauzer and the large sized wipes allow me to get a good cleaning of his paws when he's been playing in dirt. I always use one after he eats his meals to wipe his beard clean. He doesn't seem to be bothered at all by the very light scent.. He just doesn't like his beard messed with. We have him trained. He walks over to me after finishing eating to get his beard wiped because he knows he gets a treat afterwards. ; )
customer_reviews.author: Shannon B.

customer_reviews.title: Second time buying!
customer_reviews.text: I wish the sticker covering the hole would stay stickier longer but as long as I’m careful it stays sticky enough until the end. This is a huge pack and I love the ingredients! The wipes are very good sized and strong! My big boy loved being wiped down with these for grooming. He looks so shiny and handsome afterwards and his skin never gets dry afterwards. I think I have found our fav wipies bc this is my second time buying and I’ll continue to buy as needed!
customer_reviews.author: AbbyNormal

customer_reviews.title: Great pet wipe
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pet wipes- the wipe itself is a good thickness and sturdiness so that I'm able to wipe my dog without it collapsing on itself or rolling up. I tried a different wipe brand when this one was out a stock for a brief period of time, and I definitely didn't like that this other brand was thinner and would not clean as well. There is a mild scent that is pleasant to these wipes as well.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Green Tea Smells Better than Unscented
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are not wet enough for fluffy dogs. It takes several wipes for medium-sized dogs. We have an American Eskimo and a Samoyed. The size of the wipes is good and I like how they are earth-friendly. Tried the unscented version first but didn’t like the odd smell which unfortunately lingered on our dogs. Now we use the green tea scented wipes which have a nice clean smell. The biggest complaint is the packaging. The tape doesn’t keep the moisture in because it doesn’t seal well. The wipes also don’t come out individually so we are always trying to stuff extras back into the package. This makes the tape cover even more difficult to close.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Under Pressure

customer_reviews.title: Thought they were great until...
customer_reviews.text: I use them everyday after my dogs are outside. I have two chihuahuas that total 9 pounds together so a pack last a while. I can't live without them now. Update.... One thing I'm not happy about is that the last pack I ordered have barely any moisture in them and the pack before that was barely moist 1/2 way through. I'm bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Dog wipes a must have!
customer_reviews.text: I tried different wipes for my puppy, but by far I love these wipes. I use it to wipe her feet every time she’s comes into the house. It doesn’t irritate her skin and there’s no fragrance. They do make a fragrance one and it’s a very light nice smell. Definitely recommend this wipes. The only thing I wished they had is a container to store them in so it’s easier to get them out. I tried buying different containers but the wipes are too long.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie N

customer_reviews.title: I like this wipe, it is quite thick, and they are useful for keeping a dog clean.
customer_reviews.text: they smell like a wipe, as if it were a scent to cover up bad smells, not necessarily a fragrance, but rather a chemical to eliminate odors and perhaps to give a light moisture tot he wipes. I like them, after all they are not too wet and do not leave hands wet, which to me is good. They are nice and thick, it feels like they can blot some small amounts of liquid for cleaning an animals mess. I use them to clean my dog, and thus far have not seen any reaction to the skin. Indeed they are meant to be used on dogs, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: hyperionx

customer_reviews.title: Not travel sized
customer_reviews.text: These are not, as advertised, travel size. These packs are the normal dimensions as other dog-wipe packs. I bought these expressly to use while walking my dog, due to their description as travel sized. They are far too large to fit in the doggie bag zipped area. They are opened so I don't think I can return them and now have an inordinate amount of large packages of wipes to go through. This description is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: skf

customer_reviews.title: Doggie Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My dog looks forward to her bedtime clean-up with these wipes. I like the size of these wipes, large enough for almost any size dog, the fact that they are moist and hold moisture, the pleasant scent, & most of all that my dog likes to be cleaned with them. What I would appreciate is receiving them in a container in which these wipes can be placed. They are very long, and occasionally it is difficult getting just one out of the plastic wrap in which they arrived. Other than that, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Omg the packaging is a disaster
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product...but you cannot get out a single wipe - 5-10 come out at once. The package also has a flimsy re-seal and I doubt it will last as long as the package will. I could transfer to a ziploc but that's one more step to take when I really only have one hand to grab this with (trying to hold the dog with the other so she doesn't run into the house dirty...). So if they could figure out the dispensing this would be a 5 star review but it is so maddening to try to get a single wipe out I can't give it more than 2.
customer_reviews.author: jamieg1234

customer_reviews.title: Like wet paper towels
customer_reviews.text: These wipes somehow remind me of the paper towels they used in my high school bathroom, which is not exactly a pleasant memory. The scent is especially awful (I don't even know how to describe it) and lingers on my hands after washing. I was hoping for a budget alternative to Nature's Miracle wipes but ended up throwing away most of these.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: It can be a good part of grooming routine
customer_reviews.text: I use these wipes as a finishing step in the daily grooming step for my cats. The texture & strength of these wipes is excellent. The size is rather small. If they were double the size, they would work really well with medium & big cats. This size is okay for small kittens. I gave a poor score for scent. I couldn’t smell anything. The wipes worked but they were on drier side. If they carried more cleanser, perhaps they would work nicely to wipe bum areas without being a bother to the kitty. So good product, that can use quiet a bit of improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Philly fan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Crappy Package
customer_reviews.text: We really like these wipes. They are a great size and have a decent amount of moisture to them. The scent is good. These do the job BUUUUT... the packaging STINKS. The wipes tend not to come out nicely. They come out 3-4 at a time instead of 1. Also the sticky seal at the top of the package wears out. Have a large ziplock ready when the seal wears out! Will still order the product just wish they would change the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Design Artist

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: It’s water in a bag, with really hard to pull out wipes. The wipes don’t separate easily and you usually pull out 10+ when trying to grab individual wipes
customer_reviews.author: Nick Haynie

customer_reviews.title: Work great with a gentle hint of lemon smell
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes. I first tried the Earth Rated brand, but they didn't seem to be anything but a moist cloth that was just as effective as using a wet paper towel. My dog didn't smell any better than he did before wiping him. However Pogi's wipes have a slight lemon smell. Very faint, but enough to deodorize as well as clean my dog between baths. Love them. Just wish they had a plastic lid to snap closed rather than just a piece of clear reusable sticker.
customer_reviews.author: Babs Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pandemic and Travel Pup Clean Up
customer_reviews.text: My pups normally go to a groomer for baths and haircuts but that's not possible during the Covid-19 pandemic. These hypoallergenic wipes help keep their hair reasonably clean enough until they can have a deep-clean bath. I love that each package is small enough that they're easily packable for trips, once we can start traveling again. They'll easily fit into narrow suitcase spaces that would be wasted otherwise. A very handy plus for me!
customer_reviews.author: PopcornReads

customer_reviews.title: Overall better quality than other brands!
customer_reviews.text: I use these everytime my dogs come in from outside either during the rain or after the grass gets cut (pup has allergies). Compared to several other more expensive wipes these are excellent quality. Its thicker and bigger than other wipes I have tried. One wipe cleans 4 paws quickly. They smell is fresh but I do enjoy other brands that smell better. However this is now the brand I subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective cleaner for your fur buddy
customer_reviews.text: My dog hates having her paws and other parts wiped down, not so much because of the action, but because she dislikes getting wet or even slightly damp. But she seems to tolerate this product better than others I've used, mostly because Pogi's Grooming wipes don't have a strong scent and are very soft and gentle. I want my pup to stay clean and get the debris that inevitably builds up from the daily walks off of her in the easiest way possible, and this is it! I definitely recommend the product to anyone with a fussy pet.
customer_reviews.author: Practi-galTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: So useful for messy kittens
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help clean my elderly cat. She did not like me using them, but the wipes themselves are very nice and helped when I could use them. Unfortunately, she passed away shortly after I bought these wipes so I had about 90 left. I got two new (sickly) kittens and these wipes have been SO useful. They are great for cleaning up messes from the litter box and for wiping their paws and ears. I did not use these around their eyes. Overall these are very nice and very soft wipes and I would buy them again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Sufficient for the job
customer_reviews.text: The wipes are fine. No better or worse than other wipes I’ve purchased in the past. I have an old dog who needs them frequently. I purchased the 120 travel pack and find it difficult to remove just one wipe at a time. Several stick together and come out at the same time. And, the top doesn’t reseal evenly - tends to bunch up. I do, however, like the convenience of several small packages. Convenient for travel. And, if an opened package should dry out not many wipes would be ruined.
customer_reviews.author: NinaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: There are better wipes to buy
customer_reviews.text: The wipes are ok. The packaging is terrible. We couldn’t unstick the seal and eventually the package almost tore in half so we had to stick the whole thing in a large ziploc bag. Even if it did work though, trying to hold a puppy with one hand and trying to open the package with the other wouldn’t go so well together. The wipes are also thinner than some other ones we’ve had but they will work for small areas or light, gentle wiping. Overall, I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J

customer_reviews.title: Well-tolerated by Intolerant Cat
customer_reviews.text: Used on a cat but definitely big enough for medium to large dog. 5 stars for unscented as advertised. We'd used a really nice smelling lavendar/vanilla scented leave-in foam shampoo, but it set us on fire later with itching and headaches so really needed a fragrance-free product. Used one cloth to dampen her down and catch the fur from the Furminator. Then, used a second cloth to smooth her down and get remaining hair off of her body. Also, cleaned her ears very well. Bamboo-based cloths are thick. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Constant Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great pet wipes - Truly scent-free!
customer_reviews.text: The brand of "Cat Wipes" I used for years quit that line and only had scented "Pet Wipes" which had a very strong fragrance which didn't work for my cat. I purchased Pogi's, and could not be happier! Nice packaging, truly scent-free, and soft, moist and effective. My (very particular) Burmese cat even seems to enjoy being wiped down with these wipes.
customer_reviews.author: D. Daley

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes, worst packaging
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend that manufacturer invest in better design of the package. Here is why: wipes r right size & great, and pulling it out of package is a big wasteful problem. If manufacturer invest on those little plastic piece that help with pulling only one wipe out at the time instead of 10, then this will be the best wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Monic

customer_reviews.title: Best Wipes
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a couple of different brands of pet wipes. Some cheaper and some same price range. These are by far the best. The cats like them and the don't have any type of reaction to them. This is the second time I am buying this particular brand. First, time was when I had first gotten the kitties at 5 weeks old and they were not very good at cleaning themselves. Now, I buy them cause the now 8 month old kitties keep getting into things that make them itchy. These wipes help with the itchy and keep the clean.
customer_reviews.author: TribalFox

customer_reviews.title: Warm them up before use and cat will love it!
customer_reviews.text: Using these as touch ups on my 18 year old cat. He’s missing a tooth and frequently gets a bit dirty around the face when eating. These are very lightly scented. I’ve also used- very gently- to clean his ears. Appreciate that these aren’t sopping wet like other brands. They’re perfect!
customer_reviews.author: swisars

customer_reviews.title: Natural and safe for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My Schnauzer mix has very sensitive skin, both environmental and chicken allergies. I am particular about any cleansing products and Pogi's Grooming Wipes are perfect for his skin type. I always wipe his paws after a walk and these wipes are super gentle if using multiple times a day. Carries a natural, clean scent (avoid those "perfumy" scents. From my dog's experience, he would get rashes/bumps from these). I was drawn by the previous reviews. The cost is great for the peace of mind, which is priceless. Now my go to pup wipe product. Give them a try.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to pull out one wipe at a time!
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to pull out one wipe at a time! It is so frustrating! We usually use the wipes to clean up after our little guy has used his puppy pad (he is 10 weeks old) and trying to catch him and pull out a wipe never works. We end up pulling at least 3 and trying to stuff them back in to the package afterwards. When we run out of these I'll have to try another brand, which is unfortunate because I really like these wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew11

customer_reviews.title: Scent🤔
customer_reviews.text: Well I have a shih tzu and I admit he needs grooming, but the clothes are ok not sure about the scent don’t really care for it , seems to stay closed ok, maybe it’s because of sinus meds, I’ll give them another try an see😊I expected a fresher scent! Still don’t care for the scent😢
customer_reviews.author: mary r. perkins

customer_reviews.title: Best Wipes I've Used Yet
customer_reviews.text: I've had a dog for 3.5 years and in that time I've gone through quite the share of wipes. These are by far the best wipes I've used. Strong, perfectly moist, and large. The pouches are a great size for having in your car or packing them for on-the-go trips. My only complaint is that it's nearly impossible to take out just one wipe at a time. I almost always find myself having to shove back in an extra wipe or two that gets pulled out, taking up time when I'm in a rush or being a nuisance when I only have one hand available.
customer_reviews.author: MeThinks

customer_reviews.title: They're durable and smell great.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, smell wonderful and strong. I able to wipe down my English Bulldog throughly without concerns that the wip will break or come apart. Each wip has a good about of moisture alwaying me to only need 2 wips per session. The only downside, is that they wips aren't folded into eachother, the way you would expect...Think a box of tissue...it's not like that so, sometimes you can pull out more than one at a time. Not a deal breaker by any means, I just stuff them back in, quite easily. Last note, I've been buying these wips since I got my dog which has been about 1 year and 7 months.
customer_reviews.author: Leonel F.

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4 year old male Aussie mix who will sometimes 'mark' his front leg while attempting to mark something else in our neighborhood on our multiple daily walks. These grooming wipes have been a lifesaver to keep him fresh and clean between baths. They're far sturdier than other wipes that I've used on him, and they remain moist. I was skeptical that they would remain moist given the packaging, but they have and we're on our 3rd pack. I would highly recommend these wipes for daily use and they are truly a bargain at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecky

customer_reviews.title: really leans coat and removes doggy oders
customer_reviews.text: I have a large outside/inside dog. Roams on fenced acreage during day and home inside at night. Cannot bath her every night. These work well to dust & pollen & unpleasant smells from her coat when she comes in. While she prefers her damp towel rub down I prefer these. They are large enough to get the job done and unless she is very dirty one or two do the job. Really much easier than the hassle of washing dog towels.
customer_reviews.author: Flo Jo

customer_reviews.title: My goats want to eat them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for one of my goats. She is white and her buttocks are always dirty (I think she pees the bed and lays in it). She is not really enthused about getting her buttocks wiped, but is very enthused about the wipe itself. In fact all 3 of my goats really, really like these wipes. They smell very tasty. Really wish they came unscented, but considering they aren't made for goats, really can't complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: Carrington

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wipe
customer_reviews.text: Great size and quality wipe. Use on my pugs face and all over when he comes in from outside. He had been getting seasonal skin allergies but if I use these wipes he says allergy free and no real scent. Keeps him smelling fresher though. Only thing I don’t care for is the packaging hole to pull out with. It’s okay and is simple but they bunch up at times. Maybe it’s me :/ Otherwise if your looking for a good wipe this does the job. Bigger or more rectangle than most.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R Young

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: These are fine and work well for wiping my dogs paws when she comes inside. But not exactly what I was expecting. These are the size/shape/thickness/feel of baby wipes. I was expecting something bigger, thicker, and more durable. Again they work fine, but I probably won't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Su Meck

customer_reviews.title: Good for a quick wipe down
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs are really bad in the bathtub, so we figured to use this more often and occasionally wash them. The scent isn’t as strong as I hoped and they smell like regular wipes. For some reason, one of my dogs smells worse after I wipe her down and once it dries, they smell the same except it’s not as strong. As for my other dog, he doesn’t smell like anything during and after I wipe him. The wipes are nice and damp and they are very helpful whenever my dogs get dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large and lite scented
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to like about these wipes? They are nice and large and moist out of the package. They are lightly scented and my dog seems to enjoy the every other day wipe down. I use these between my pups baths and after her walks. I like to wipe her paws after walking in the grass since I’ve seen my complex spay chemicals on the lawn. I would prefer if they came in a box with a lid but that is my only minor complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great pet wipes but not the greatest packaging
customer_reviews.text: These pet wipes are GREAT. They don't really have a scent; they are sturdy; and they are easy on my dog's skin. I have two complaints: One is with the packaging -- the wipes can be very difficult to get out of the too-flexible plastic package with its narrow flip-top opening. The second is that these wipes can only be ordered in a quantity of 1 package per month, which is not ideal when you have multiple dogs in the house. But the wipes themselves are terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Phyl

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend, Have Been Using for Uears
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite dog wipes. Our little girl has some allergy issues and these wipes have been helpful in keeping her clean without causing flare ups. We live in a city/downtown setting so she has her paws cleaned several times a day with them. I kept a large back stock on hand, we travel with them, keep them in the car and when needed fully wipe her down with them. Definitely recommend as a neutral, simple canine cleaning solution!
customer_reviews.author: Cassy D

customer_reviews.title: Soft and rugged
customer_reviews.text: A very generous supply of wipes. I hope the soft packaging and seal holds up over the time it will take me to use them up. My new Frenchie does not object to them much when I wipe his wrinkles and ears. I’ve also started using them on my elderly papillon’s feet sinne he has allergy problems this time of year. They are soft enough fo the little soft face and rugged enough for paws.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Carter Bell

customer_reviews.title: OK product, terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: The actual wipes are OK. Getting them out of the package one at a time, however, is impossible. In fact, getting them out at all is a struggle. You remember those napkin dispensers in dinners & fast food places where you struggle to get one napkin out and instead wind up with 40 napkins? Yeah, that's how this dispenser works - pretty useless and frustrating, esp. if you are rushing to clean a dog that just came in with muddy paws...
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: A good bottom wipe and generally quick clean
customer_reviews.text: Not as effective as a proper bath (our dog's hair is medium length) but is nice for a quick rubdown if he smells a little funky from outside. Our dog doesn't often get super dirty so I can't say whether or not gets their full body clean from lots of dirt, mud, etc. Works well to clean off his bottom when he has poop left behind. Also works well enough to clean his paws when it's wet and/or muddy outside. So far happy with the purchase and makes cleaning up small issues (wet feet, bottom clingers, etc) easy and quick.
customer_reviews.author: Cally

customer_reviews.title: Perfect working wipes
customer_reviews.text: My sister's kitten loves to roll around in the backyard dirt and when he comes back inside the house his black fur nearly turns brown with dirt! It's not healthy to bathe him every time so these wipes are basically like his quick baths. These wipes plus his self grooming eliminates all traces of dirt and dust - its kinda surprising. I also use these on my dog and she has sensitive skin under her belly so these wipes works for those sensitive areas. She also comes back inside with dirt on her paws and nails and these wipe everything off with ease. No smell or residue, which are huge pluses.
customer_reviews.author: Denz

customer_reviews.title: Clean dog  happy home
customer_reviews.text: We are on our second pack. It’s a huge bag of wipes that lasts for a while for our 21lbs dog. I’m not sure about deodorizing but it cleans his paws and face. I don’t find it moist enough to clean the body unless you have a short coat dog. We put the wipes in a plastic container with a pop open top to make it easy to use. The sticky seal will stop sticking at some point. I used it on my face when I rang out of my own wipes, made my skin feel pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Linna F

customer_reviews.title: My cat was allergic to them :(
customer_reviews.text: Almost immediately after i wiped my cat down with just 1 wipe, he started to sneeze uncontrollably. At first i didn't think the wipes were the culprit until the sneezing continued all day long after he was wiped down. His eyes also watered up. It was only after i took a warm damp washcloth and washed off whatever the wipe had left behind, that my cat was better. His sneezing disappeared and he was fine after that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells Horrible
customer_reviews.text: They're supposedly unscented but these have an awful smell to them. After using them on my pet, I had to actually wash her, to get this smell off.
customer_reviews.author: PeanutBrittle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use these on my cat. They are odorless (which is preferred), come in a very sturdy plastic, and are super effective in cleaning his fur. Oddly, my cat actually doesn't mind me giving him a "bath" with these. He likes to get into things that create messes, so it was nice to finally find a product that I didn't have to chase him around the house to use. I'll undoubtedly be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: AD Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Great Wipes for a clean, fresh pet!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 15 year old siamese cat. He is old, and can’t lick himself all over to clean. These wipes are great for helping him stay clean and soft. These wipes have a very pleasant smell, not too overwhelming, and they were just moist enough. My cat loved getting wiped down with these wipes, he was purring and loving the rub down. I highly recommend these wipes!
customer_reviews.author: Crafty4277

customer_reviews.title: Good for dogs who are hypoallergenic!
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved my order and I'm quite impressed. Both my Boston Terriers love to sun bathe and roll around in the dirt. What made me purchase this product was that it is hypoallergenic and it is fragrance free. Using Pogi's wipes was the best choice ever! Other brands didn't seem up to par, but these are blow other brands out of the water. Removed all the dirt and made both of my dogs coats shiny. Will buy this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Do

customer_reviews.title: Super useful for keeping dog and home clean
customer_reviews.text: Our dog's glory is to wander every corner of our yard, to sniff and to roll in the grass. We use the wipes to make sure muddy paws are cleaned as he comes in and for "dry baths" if his joyful rolling gets a little messy and these wipes are somehow gentle enough for his skin and my sensitive scent allergies yet strong enough to give him a good, quick clean. Our only wished for improvement is a better dispenser so that we can grab one wipe at a time. Right now often 2 or 3 are grabbed at once.
customer_reviews.author: Christie A. Veitch

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes with packaging issues.
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes. They have a great thickness and moisture level. They are a great size and have been wonderful for wiping down my cats after their daily walk in a harness. My only issue is the packaging and ease of getting each wipe out. They have a habit of coming out in clumps of a few wipes. It is an effort to take just one out at a time. I would highly recommend these wipes to everyone if it wasn't for this issue. It can be quite frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Shai Yammanee

customer_reviews.title: Healthy
customer_reviews.text: We used this to clean our fur babies before they lay in our bed. It was soft and moist. They weren’t dry. The only thing is that we didn’t really like the smell so we quickly used them. The amount of wipes that were given was a good amount. It’s fragrance free, earth friendly, hypoallergenic, and bamboo based. It’s pretty pricey.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I use them on my cat, he has diarrhea issues and I needed a strong yet soft wet towel that wouldn’t break in the middle of the cleaning operation. The only thing that it could be improved is the way they are packed together. Most times you get out more than one towel. Other than that, this is a regular item in our house.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Large wipes that retain their moisture!
customer_reviews.text: I like that the wipes are textured, stay wet and they don't shred or start to fall apart when using them on my dog's rough paws. I know these wipes are supposed to be unscented but they have a strange smell and they don't really deodorize my dog's "just played rough outside and got stinky" smell. Prefer the other Nature's Miracle scented wipes I purchase (for less money, but don't keep their moisture and aren't as sturdy as the Pogi wipes). Overall a great product and will continue to use in conjunction with my other dog wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

product_meta.title: Pogi's Grooming Wipes - Hypoallergenic Pet Wipes for Dogs & Cats - Plant-Based, Earth-Friendly, Deodorizing Dog Wipes
feature_bullets: Conditioning Ingredients - Aloe Vera, Vitamin E, and Hawaiian Awapuhi help clean, freshen and condition while giving the coat a healthy shine. Perfect for wiping away dirt and odor from paws, bodies, and bums in between baths.
Large Pet Wipes (8 x 9 inches) - Our quilted dog wipes are made big enough for even the largest dogs, and thick enough for the heaviest coats.
Earth-Friendly - Made with 100% sustainably harvested bamboo fiber.
Hypoallergenic - Completely free of parabens, alcohol, and harsh chemicals.
Super Pack - 100 Unscented Fresh Wipes for Dogs - 1 Month Supply

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
